page.title: 03Mrs H. A Lady of 101 Years.
page.content: Mrs H. is looked after in a elderly persons' home.She was born in 1884 and moved to this area 6 years ago.She likes this area because it is peaceful.Her only living relative is a niece, 70 yrs old, but Mrs H. remains cheerful.She got married in her late fifties and was a nurse in the 1st World War,earning a halfcrown a week.Her grandfather was a farmer and used to smoke a clay pipe.She used to wash her clothes by hand and was not allowed to use makeup.She lived two miles from school and walked that journey four times a day.Mrs H.used to drive a one horse wagonette for transport.The greatest changes of her life were radio/television.She doesn't like the present day times because people are not so polite.
